abstracts.cdata!:
The objective of the Third National
            Program for Community Empowerment (PNPM) in Rural Areas -
            Disaster Management Support Project for Indonesia is for
            villagers in PNPM-Rural locations to benefit from improved
            socio-economic and local governance conditions. A one-year
            extension is required to ensure that the reconstruction
            activities in Mentawai can be finished, Mentawai is very
            isolated and transportation to the island is infrequent and
            seasonal.  PNPM-Rural is the only community-based program on
            Mentawai and therefore critical to bring benefits directly
            to the affected population. Directorate for Village and
            Community Empowerment (PMD) has already mobilized additional
            assistants for sub-district Facilitators (FK/FT Assistants)
            to help accelerate the completion of infrastructure work and
            to build the communities resilience for future disasters.
